text.section:
An institution of higher education in the State that includes in the curriculum courses necessary for the licensing of health care professionals in the State may include in the curriculum courses or offer special seminars that address the identification and elimination of health care services disparities of minority populations as reported in the findings of:
The Institute of Medicine's report "Unequal Treatment: Confronting Racial and Ethnic Disparities in Health Care"; and
The Surgeon General's "Healthy People 2020" report.
